phrases: Uesugi-kun...
Huh?
Just you here, Itsuki?
Y-Yes!
Did you just put something in your bag?
Yes, I am preparing for the school trip.
Yeah?
It is coming up, huh?
Things are not so great between us right now...
but hopefully the school trip brings us back together.
You are right.
We can get back to how we were before.
Underwear, socks...
Are you bringing your own toothbrush?
Come on, Raiha.
We do not need to buy everything new.
You have money saved up from tutoring.
No one's going to blame you for spending some of it on yourself.
But the sisters are going to hate you if you cheaped out on their birthday.
Huh?
Their birthday's coming up?
It already happened.
I guess it does not matter.
They were late, anyway.
Besides, they never told me, so...
If you get something, you give back!
Even elementary school kids know that.
Do you think I should get them something?
Uesugi-san.
I was texting with Itsuki-san yesterday.
We decided to come shopping together.
Anyway, their birthday...
Shh!
Shh!
So you are here with her.
In that case, we cannot shop together.
I might know what to get them if I watch how they shop.
Wh-Why are you following me?
We are shopping for the same trip anyway.
What is the problem?
Yes, we are.
But while they may share a purpose, they are totally different things.
I am here to buy underwear!
R-R-R-R-R-R-R-R-R-Raiha-chan, what do you think of this?
I think that is way too adult, I-Itsuki-san.
I am a h-h-h-h-high schooler, after all.
This is about right.
Do not you need to shop?
I tend to take good care of my things.
You are still wearing little girl panties?
H-How did you know?!
Thanks for waiting.
Huh?
Where is Itsuki?
She is taking her own measurements and trying some clothes on.
You are quintuplets.
Could not she just buy the same sizes?
That is quintuplet harassment.
Quintassment!
I do not know why she is taking measurements, though.
She has not grown more than the rest of us, has she?
I guess things are complicated for quintuplets, huh?
They are!
Especially these days!
N-No, anyway, school camp ended pretty badly,
so let us make sure we do not regret anything on our school trip.
Not that I really care, but I will be sure to take care of my health.
Sheesh.
You act like you are not looking forward to it.
He is been looking through the guidebook over and over at home.
Raiha!
Besides, you might run into the girl from the photo.
That will not happen.
Huh?
Was not that in Kyoto?
That is what Dad said.
Even then, she was a tourist, too.
What girl in the photo?
Come on, you should show her.
It is nothing.
I do not even have the photo anymore.
Something smells fishy.
You should be able to tell me, if it is actually nothing.
I know why you cannot tell me!
It is because you have regrets!
Now, tell me, and get it off your chest!
She is a girl I ran into in Kyoto.
Her name is Rena.
Rena...
The end.
The end?!
B-But you have got me curious!
I want to hear a little more!
Please!
She is basically his first love.
F-First love?!
Hey!
No one ever said...
Sisters War: Part 1
Full house.
I lost.
One more time!
We are playing one more game!
I will take you on anytime.
Miku.
Miku, the game's done.
Two pair.
So slow!
And weak!
You seem sleepy.
I noticed you woke up early and went somewhere.
Yeah.
I begged my workplace to let me borrow the kitchen.
So are you going to have him try it, and...
You have worked so hard for this day.
I am rooting for you until the end.
I hope it is still good when it is cold.
I know.
How about the next person who wins gets to ask anyone else to do anything?
Anything, huh?
Sounds good.
Challenge accepted.
I will win.
These sparks...
We are just really into this card game, right?
We will have your large luggage taken to the hotel.
Bring only your valuables.
That is it for instructions.
Dismissed.
Is something wrong?
No, I think I just imagined it.
I wonder where Fu-kun's group is going.
Is there anywhere you all want to go?
Well, if you are going to travel, you have to go shopping.
Fancy shops are way more fun than some old temples.
You do not get it.
We are in Kyoto, of all places.
You want him to try some of the local delicacies.
I agree with that too, but...
At the moment, I would like to remind him of what happened that day here at this station.
I mean, we could go explore.
Itsuki, what is gotten into you?
Futaro-kun's group left.
The only reason we would not agree to meet up with them
is because we are all thinking the same thing.
We are following them.
Do these toriis go on forever?
I have seen pictures of them, but they are stunning in person.
This is so grammable.
Come on, everyone, peace signs.
It is kind of rare that we get a picture of just us sisters, huh?
Oh, we do not have any of just the five of us?
We did not take one of us at the fireworks festival?
We have not taken one since we were on our field trip back in elementary school.
Let us get a picture of all of us this time, then.
Do you think Futaro's at the top already?
I have not gotten a glimpse of him.
Guys are fast.
All right, we need to keep up!
This stairway's... pretty long... huh?
My legs are starting to hurt.
Come on, everyone!
You are so slow!
She does not have a care in the world.
That is what we love about her.
You are right.
She is nothing like a certain schemer that I know.
You are coming up with some nasty plan again, are not you?
Me? I would never!
There are two ways we can go.
It looks like both lead to the peak.
Which way has Fu-kun gone?
I will fall behind pretty badly if I do not meet him here.
It is already noon.
Let us have lunch at that shop over there.
Wait, lunch...
What?
Is there something else you want?
YOU-Um...
Full house!
I win!
Let us split into two groups.
Miku and I will take the right route.
Ichika, Nino, and Itsuki will take the left route.
That way, we will run into Uesugi-san at some point.
Hang on a second.
You cannot decide that for us.
I am the victor!
My orders are absolute!
I have the right to order you to do anything!
Left Route
Look what happened because of your stupid idea.
Judging from the flow of people, the other route was the right one.
Um...
What are you two talking about?
It is a washroom.
I wanted to go.
I guess we took the right route.
There are not any ahead, are there?
I guess I should go, too.
Right Route
Miku!
Hurry up, or lunchtime's going to be over!
Just a little longer.
You worked so hard for this day.
Hang in there just a little longer.
Yotsuba...
Thanks.
It is lunchtime.
I am getting hungry.
I wonder what Fu-kun's group had planned for lunch?
Huh?
Where is Ichika?
Shoot!
From what I saw on the map, this is the shorter route to the peak.
I might not be able to beat Yotsuba when she is by herself,
but given Miku's fitness, I should be able to beat them to the peak.
What do I do when I meet Futaro-kun?
Those other guys will be there, too.
Still, Miku's been suspicious.
She is going to make a move sometime during this school trip.
I have to do it again.
If I cannot take back the lie I have already told,
all I can do is continue to lie in order to stop Miku.
No one's here.
We did not run into each other along the way,
which must mean Futaro-kun took the right route.
I have to hurry.
I ran a lot.
Miku and Yotsuba cannot be here yet.
Ichika.
Why are you dressed up as me?
If there is a reason for this...
Ichika, this was not what I meant.
Is this what you really wanted to do?
Yotsuba, what do you mean?
Ichika is trying to get in the way.
Get in the way of what?
In the way of...
Yotsuba, wait!
Mountain Peak
your confession to Uesugi-san, Miku!
Okay...
I made it first.
Huh?
What did you just say?
Uesugi-san, did you just hear that?
Miku!
We are finally at the peak.
Miku!
Wait, please!
Where are you going?
Ichika, you crossed the line.
I am getting fed up with you.
Are you happy about making her cry?
Wait, Nino, that was my...
Yotsuba, it is fine.
No matter the result... this is more or less what I was trying to do.
How low are you going to...
I do not want to hear that from you.
You said at the hot springs that you would walk over anyone to make it work.
How are we any different?
Tell me.
I did say that.
I do not intend on giving him up to anyone else.
But the bond between the five of us is just as important to me.
Even if you were the one who was chosen someday,
I would have wanted to celebrate.
I cannot walk another step.
Honestly,
you ate too much at the restaurant below.
Huh?
What are you doing?
I mean, I do not know what is going on, either.
Girls, take it down a notch.
Shut up and stay out of this!
You will make things even messier!
Go chase after Miku!
What?
Hurry up!
On the double!
Fine.
Sorry, guys.
I will meet you up ahead.
Right.
I-I will go find her, too.
We are going down, too.
Okay.
Shit, Miku's not here anymore.
I got through to Itsuki!
She is on the bus with Miku.
Keihan Bus
Inari-taisha
Okay.
Let us take the bus.
Uesugi-san, you heard what I said at the peak, right?
I did not hear nothing.
Ah!
You definitely heard!
I said I did not hear anything.
Just leave it at that!
Still, it is a fact that my reckless comment hurt Miku.
She is been working so hard.
And I am the one who gave Ichika the idea to do this, too... during our family trip...
You are right.
It is your fault.
Consider the time and place before saying something like that.
So you did hear me.
I mean, I knew, I guess.
You knew?
You knew what?
I mean, you know, that...
M-
that Miku has had feelings for me.
Am I hearing things?
Could you say that again?
Stop it!
I am not saying it again!
Uesugi-san the Dense...
I cannot believe it.
Well, a lot's happened.
So I was really confused when she, of all people, said she was cheering us on.
That was not really Miku.
I was right about that, huh?
I said, it is fine.
You worry about people too much.
To be honest, you take it way too far.
I am okay with that.
Remember I told you before about how when I failed, everyone came with me?
I dragged them all into my problems.
It is not something I can make up for so easily.
It is only natural that they should end up happier than I do.
Is that how it has to be?
I wanted everyone to enjoy this trip, too.
Is there any way everyone can be happy, Uesugi-san?
There is.
If each person could feel happy without comparing themselves to others...
That would be the kind of world that you are looking for.
Then...
But...
In reality, it is not uncommon for someone is happiness to make someone else unhappy.
Some kinds of happiness are gained only by competing and taking from each other.
In that case, what can I do?
There is nothing you can do.
There is a limit.
Do not you think it is a little presumptuous?
Trying to get everything.
When you choose to have something, you choose not to have something else.
Someday, you will have to choose.
Someday, for sure.
Listen up, everyone.
We are being tailed by a sneak photographer.
I noticed it ever since we were at Kyoto Station.
I am sure of it.

Molesters Targeting Students on School Trips Kyoto City on High Alert A high number of incidents of thefts, blackmail, and groping in dense areas such as on buses, continues to plague students on school trips in Kyoto.
Such incidents targeting students are particularly prevalent in Kyoto, as compared to the rest of the nation.
I read in the news that they target students on school trips.
Even then, why would they target you, Nino?
What is that supposed to mean?!
I knew it!
It is a feast!
Let us post it on Instagram.
Anyway, Miku and Ichika are back at the hotel, right?
Yes.
Both of them seem worn out after all that walking.
They are resting in our room.
I doubt they are in the same room together.
I cannot believe Miku set out on her own.
I am going to go check on them.
Hold it.
I am almost done eating.
I will come with you.
Nino!
I am already finished!
Hey, Uesugi-kun, is something the matter?
What happened to Maeda?
A long bathroom visit.
Me too, then.
Which means I am coming, too.
Do not follow me.
Miku, Ichika, I know you are in there.
Open the door.
They are not responding.
They are ignoring their phones, too.
Miku, I am sorry.
I ruined everything!
But there are still two more days on the school trip.
I want you to let me make things right.
Yotsuba did not do anything wrong.
Yotsuba...
After what you said, Nino, now I am hearing things, too!
Y-Yeah, right?
We are just hearing things.
There is no way he would be in the hotel.
What was that scream?
What is
Miku
Nino, what was that scream?
You finally picked up.
Ichika.
You...
Futaro-kun, I am glad I ran into you.
Do you have time tomorrow?
Miku, do you have any plans for tomorrow?
There is something I want to talk to you about.
There is something I want to talk to you about.
You can see all the way to the station.
What if we fall?
It feels higher, seeing it for the first time in a while.
Uesugi-kun.
I thought you were with your friends.
Oh, I wanted to talk to Miku.
I thought she would be with you.
Miku is not here.
She does not seem to be well yet.
She is resting at the hotel.
And Ichika and Nino are walking around with their friends from second year.
I am worried about Miku, but...
Yeah, so the two of us are spending our time together.
It is kind of sad seeing less than half of you.
I-It is not bad, for a change.
Hey, we are at Kiyomizu Temple!
Itsuki?
Look at this scenery, Uesugi-kun!
It is gorgeous!
Quit tugging!
It is dangerous!
You are afraid of this?
And you call yourself a man?
I-I am not scared at all.
You must be freaking out yourself.
Oh, I know.
Let us take a picture together.
Here.
Huh?
Why?!
Please, Yotsuba.
Sure, I guess.
Hurry up and get it over with.
O-Okay.
Thank you for taking the time.
Why am I being so bold?
But this ought to be enough to make him remember what happened six years ago.
I am sorry for the trouble.
I am sorry you have to spend your school trip like this.
I am going to rest in my room for a while longer.
Sure...
Oh, right.
There is been a sneak photographer spotted in this hotel.
Be careful.
Thank you.
Like the shadows, unknowable, was it?
What are you doing, Nino?
Imitating you.
In more ways than one.
They would not buy that two sisters are both staying in sick together.
When is the next head count?
Yeah, we have some time.
I am asking why you came here.
I told you.
I wanted to talk to you.
If you came to cheer me up, forget it.
Huh?
Why would I do such a thing?
My rival just backed down by herself.
It is nothing but lucky for me.
All I need to do now is defeat Ichika.
That sly fox...
What should I do with her?
Anyway, I am taking Fu-kun.
You okay with that?
Fu-kun...
Since when have you...
What?
Are you going to tell me you are not going to give him up because you liked him first?
I do not mean that.
Sure, you might have been first.
I do not really know enough to say time does not matter in love.
This is my first time.
I have no idea what is right or wrong.
All I know is that I love him more than anyone.
I have not given up, either.
The school trip is a perfect chance to get close to him,
and you are spending it locked in this room.
You have practically given up.
Your turn's over.
Bye, loser.
I do not want to give up!
But I am scared.
I knew it would end up like this.
But now that Futaro knows how I feel,
I do not know if I am good enough for him.
There is no way he would like someone like me.
I never thought it would be so scary to fight fair and square.
Look, Itsuki.
Long Life 500 yen
Core Strength 500 yen
Success in love 500 yen
Academic success 400 yen
Happiness 400 yen
Good luck charms for love.
Let us buy one for Miku.
Um...
Where is Uesugi-kun?
He must have gone back to his friends.
This was supposed to be my chance.
Itsuki.
Are you hiding something from me?
You have to tell Uesugi-kun.
That you were the one who met him six years ago.
Episode 12
Sisters War: Part 2
Sisters War: Part 2.
